rules_text:
[i]Trusted Advice[/i] – Whenever your commander attacks, scry 1.
[i]Gristonne's Successor[/i] – {3}{U}{B}: Any number of target players mill four cards. Draw a card if a noncreature card was milled this way.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more creature cards among graveyards, transform Darios.
